title: [K-12] Literacy Learning Ecosystems and Postcolonialism: Microlearning in Science Disciplines

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of scientific disciplines and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with modular content enabling learning on the move

learning_goals: Learners can analyze structural characteristics of literacy learning ecosystems from a postcolonial perspective.
Learners acquire methods to critically evaluate linguistic boundaries embedded in scientific texts.

Learners can submit reconstructed outcomes of five or more scientific concepts and a self-assessment checklist by applying mobile learning strategies (e.g., learning walks, activity-based quizzes) at least three times a week during two-week microlearning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
